rest-module-growthexperiments.v0-desc: Experimental editing suggestions and editor feedback regarding such suggestions
rest-endpoint-desc-get-growthexperiments: Returns tips, relevant to the given user, that help new users engage with editing content.
Provides link suggestions for page content.
rest-endpoint-desc-put-growthexperiments: Records feedback, by the current user, on image suggestions for page content.
rest-endpoint-desc-get-growthexperiments: Shows information useful for monitoring link and image suggestions, broken down by topic.
Returns info about the mentees being mentored by a given user.
Returns info about the mentees being mentored by a given user, filtered by mentee name prefix.
rest-endpoint-desc-post-growthexperiment: Records completion of editing suggestions by the current user.
Prevents newcomer editing suggestions for the current user.
rest-endpoint-desc-get-growthexperiments: Returns data about the impact of a user on the wiki.
rest-endpoint-desc-post-growthexperiment: Returns data about the impact of a user on the wiki.
